Class StarBackgroundManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.tetris.view.StarBackgroundManager
public class StarBackgroundManager extends Object
Example class demonstrating how to integrate ShootingStarAnimator into the Tetris game's background. This is a reference implementation - adapt it to your specific needs.

  • Constructor Details

    • StarBackgroundManager

      public StarBackgroundManager(javafx.scene.layout.Pane backgroundPane)
      Creates a new StarBackgroundManager.
      Parameters:
      backgroundPane - the pane where stars will be rendered

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the ambient star animation with default settings. Stars will appear randomly every 1-5 seconds.

    • start

      public void start(double minInterval, double maxInterval)
      Starts the ambient star animation with custom timing.
      Parameters:
      minInterval - minimum seconds between stars
      maxInterval - maximum seconds between stars

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the ambient star animation. Existing stars will complete their animation.

    • pause

      public void pause()
      Pauses the ambient star animation. Can be resumed with resume().

    • resume

      public void resume()
      Resumes the ambient star animation after pause.

    • createAmbientStar

      private void createAmbientStar()
      Creates a single ambient shooting star with random size variation.

    • celebrate

      public void celebrate(int intensity)
      Triggers a celebration effect with multiple shooting stars. Useful for special events like clearing 4 lines (Tetris), level up, etc.
      Parameters:
      intensity - the number of stars (recommended: 5-15)

    • celebrateSmall

      public void celebrateSmall()
      Triggers a small celebration effect. Good for minor achievements (clearing 2-3 lines, combos, etc.)

    • celebrateMedium

      public void celebrateMedium()
      Triggers a medium celebration effect. Good for clearing 4 lines (Tetris) or similar achievements.

    • celebrateLarge

      public void celebrateLarge()
      Triggers a large celebration effect. Good for level ups, high scores, or game completion.

    • createSpecialStar

      public void createSpecialStar()
      Creates a single large shooting star. Useful as a subtle visual cue for important events.

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Checks if the star animation is currently active.
      Returns:
      true if stars are being generated

    • getAnimator

      public ShootingStarAnimator getAnimator()
      Gets the underlying animator for direct access if needed.
      Returns:
      the ShootingStarAnimator instance
